mil7.6.6:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘satapattassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.6.6:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, satapatto ravitvā paresaṃ khemaṃ vā bhayaṃ vā ācikkhati;
mil7.6.6:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paresaṃ dhammaṃ desayamānena vinipātaṃ bhayato dassayitabbaṃ, nibbānaṃ khemato dassayitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.6:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, satapattassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
